item.title: Espresso drinks
item.description: notes I’m not going to be super precise here on this post a shot of espresso is somewhere between 35ml to 40ml my machine default is 50ml so I recently got a “little” capsule espresso machine it’s kinda fun to thinker around to see what it can do, so here are some recipes for simple espresso drinks and desserts 1. Affogato an affogato is a simple dessert, you’ll need:
